title: Firefox Ubuntu issues
content: I just off loaded all user data then flashed a 128Gb usb installed Ubuntu on that and now boot run from the USB drive this was all done because someone told me that I needed the extra GB to share with my pro in order to run a 90 day stressed test on a SSI I recently deployed. Thanks for the help
creator: michaelwoolum50

title: Latest Firefox Update
content:
Once again, when I updated Firefox, it changed a LOT of my settings, including displaying the toolbar and open tabs bar.

When this happened last - months ago - it seems Mozilla realized this had happened to a lot of users, and managed to restore us to all the information that had been "lost".

I hope you can do that again, and can find a way to not put at least ME, and I'd bet a lot of other users, through the OMG!!! What do I do NOW?! panic.

Happy Holidays.

Alan Gurevich [edited email from community support forum]
creator: algee_73
